Mono bụ asụsụ ihe dị ka mmadụ 65,000 na-asụ n'akụkụ ugwu ọdịda anyanwụ nke mba Democratic Republic of the Congo. Ọ bụ otu n'ime asụsụ Banda, nke dị n'okpuru alaka Ubangian nke asụsụ NigerCongo
O nwere olumba ise: Bili, Bubanda, Mpaka, Galaba, na Kaga.

Mono nwere ụda mgbochiume n/w/ iri atọ na atọ, gụnyere nkwụsị egbugbere ọnụ atọ (//k͡p//, //ɡ͡b//, na prenasalized //ᵑ͡ᵐɡ͡b/ /), usoro ụdaume asatọ na-enweghị atụ, na flap labiodental / Xia/ (allophonically a bilabial flap [化]) nke dị iche na //v// na /w/
Ụda dị na Mono: elu, ala, etiti
